summary.content: Apparently Zeldman’s accusation that 99.9% of all websites are obsolete is inaccurate. According to this thesis, only 99.29% of websites are obsolete out of an examined 2.4 million. Zeldman has formally retracted his earlier estimate.

content.html:
Apparently Zeldman’s accusation that 99.9% of all websites are obsolete is inaccurate. According to this thesis, only 99.29% of websites are obsolete out of an examined 2.4 million.

Zeldman has formally retracted his earlier estimate.
content.plain:
Apparently Zeldman’s accusation that 99.9% of all websites are obsolete is inaccurate. According to this thesis, only 99.29% of websites are obsolete out of an examined 2.4 million.
Zeldman has formally retracted his earlier estimate.
content.source:
Apparently [Zeldman’s]({{% wayback "http://www.zeldman.com" %}} "Venture capitalists: Give Zeldman your money!") accusation that [99.9% of all websites are obsolete]({{% wayback "http://www.digital-web.com/features/feature_2002-09.shtml" %}} "It's not that unbelievable...") is inaccurate. According to [this thesis]({{% wayback "http://www.ub.uib.no/elpub/2001/h/413001/" %}}), only [99.29% of websites are obsolete]({{% wayback "http://www.benmeadowcroft.com/me/archive/2003/january.shtml#link25th" %}}) out of an examined 2.4 million.

Zeldman has formally retracted his [earlier estimate]({{% wayback "http://meet-the-makers.com/conversations/dwws/6/" %}}).
